Note: I am assuming that "PQCDTB", "PC61BM", and "PC71BM" are names of materials, and "38% EQE at 480 nm" and "41% EQE at 480 nm" are measurements of material properties (External Quantum Efficiency at a specific wavelength). If these assumptions are incorrect, then there may not be any valid "Property Name" entities in the paragraph.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "38%" and "41%", which represent the external quantum efficiency (EQE) of the device at 480 nm wavelength when PQCDTB is used as a donor and PC61BM or PC71BM is used as an acceptor, respectively.

The other entities in the paragraph, such as "PQCDTB", "PC61BM", "PC71BM", and "EQE", do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and are not included in the table.
